bike.description: S-Works FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design, Zertz inserts

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, monocoque construction, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing, full carbon legs, crown and steerer w/ Zertz inserts

S-Works SL, FACT carbon handlebar, short-reach drop, 31.8mm
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/ neoprene padding
New Shimano Dura-Ace, 10-speed STI, flight deck compatible
New Shimano Dura-Ace, 10-speed STI, flight deck compatible
Silver cage, black body, w/ toe clip and strap
